Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.description: To do a better verification of the orderer delivery service, the OTE spy, a Deliver Client that attaches to the orderer to receive blocks some time after the test starts, must be fixed and then it can be leveraged in several tests. The functionality became "broken" after we moved to v1.0 when identity certs became required; the Spy deliver client (just like any peer) must obtain and use one when connecting to the orderer.
